meanings.definition: The quality or state of being diffuse.
meanings.sent1: The diffuseness of the light in the room created a soft and gentle glow.
meanings.sent2: The diffuseness of her speech made it hard to understand her main point.
meanings.sent3: The diffuseness of the paint on the canvas gave the artwork a dreamy feel.
meanings.sent4: The diffuseness of the music enveloped the audience in a wave of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The diffuseness of the perfume filled the entire room with a sweet fragrance.

meanings.definition: The act of spreading out or scattering.
meanings.sent1: The diffuseness of the seeds ensured that they were scattered far and wide.
meanings.sent2: The diffuseness of the ink on the paper made the writing appear blurry.
meanings.sent3: The diffuseness of the confetti at the party added to the festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The diffuseness of the rumors spread quickly throughout the small town.
meanings.sent5: The diffuseness of the scent from the bakery drew customers in from the street.
